Body: Possible Duplicate:  Where are log files located on Android?  Yesterday evening I left wi-fi enabled overnight. This morning I found my Archos 101 rebooting over and over again (eating up the battery power very quickly). I managed to shut it down, plugged in the power, rebooted and now it's running fine.But of course I would like to know what caused this.Are there any log files I can examine to determine the cause ?My device is an unrooted Archos 101.Last thing I installed was the Flash 10.2 player update and a quickpix update.UPDATE:Although I searched for it before posting my question, I obviously didn't find the following question: where are logfiles located, which is virtually the same (as pointed out by Matthew+. I stand corrected. This question may be closed.
Title: Are there any log files you can examine do determine why an unrooted Android device is rebooting repeatedly?

history.Text: Yesterday evening I left wi-fi enabled overnight. This morning I found my Archos 101 **rebooting over and over again** (eating up the battery power very quickly). I managed to shut it down, plugged in the power, rebooted and now it's running fine.But of course I would like to know what caused this.**Are there any log files I can examine to determine the cause ?**My device is an unrooted Archos 101.Last thing I installed was the Flash 10.2 player update and a quickpix update.
Are there any log files you can examine do determine why an unrooted Android device is rebooting repeatedly ?

I managed to shut it down, plugged in the power, rebooted and now it's running fine.But of course I would like to know what caused this.**Are there any log files I can examine to determine the cause ?**My device is an unrooted Archos 101.Last thing I installed was the Flash 10.2 player update and a quickpix update.----------**UPDATE:** - Although I searched for it before posting my question, I obviously didn't find the following question: [where are logfiles located][1], which is virtually the same (as pointed out by Matthew+. *I stand corrected.*  - **This question may be closed.**  [1]: http://android.stackexchange.com/questions/941/where-are-log-files-located-on-android
